name: Bang a Gong!
tooltip:
Bang a Gong!Level 60

The Scarab Gong looms ominously before you. Steel yourself, <name>; for once the Scarab Gong is rung, the gates of Ahn'Qiraj will be opened.

From the slackened maw of the beast can only come chaos and destruction. Defend your people!

Requirements:
- The Scepter of the Shifting Sands
